pages.text: $(br)Through special entrances on the surface, you can enter a unique $(key)dungeon dimension$(). It contains valuable loot, but also powerful mobs â€” you must defeat the boss to return safely.$(br2)You can use the $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$() to find $(bold)dungeon entrances$().
pages.title: Dungeon Trials

pages.text: Entering a dungeon requires an $(bold)entry fee$(). Right-click the $(key)dungeon portal$() to learn more.$(br2)Defeat the boss in the last room, or run $(copy:/dungeon leave)$(bold)/dungeon leave$() to leave the dungeon.$(br2)Special loot types in each dungeon:$(br2)$(copy:Dark Dungeon)Dark Dungeon$(): lots of $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() and $(mage/essence#el)Enlightening Essence$().$(br2)$(copy:Desert Dungeon)Desert Dungeon$(): lots of gear.
